item.title: 🍽 HUB1 - Sprout Lunch Menu
item.description: 🍽 HUB1 - Sprout Lunch Menu: | Vores daglige, friske og næringsrige måltidssalat med frit valg mellem vegetabilsk eller animalsk protein. | Our daily fresh and nutritious meal salad with a free choice of either plant-based or animal protein. |

item.title: 🍽 HUB1 - Homebound Lunch Menu
item.description: 🍽 HUB1 - Homebound Lunch Menu: | Braiseret spidsbryst med relish på rødbede og peberrod serveret med flødekartofler med spinat og urter | Braised brisket with beetroot and horseradish relish. Served with cream potatoes with spinach and herbs. |

item.title: 🍽 HUB1 - Globetrotter Lunch Menu
item.description:
🍽 HUB1 - Globetrotter Lunch Menu: | Grøn thai karry med kylling og kokosmælk. Masser grønt og urt. Serveret med ris | Thai green curry with chicken and coconut milk. With lots of greens and herbs. |
VEGETAR: Grøn thai karry med tofu og kokosmælk. Masser grønt og urt. Serveret med ris | Thai green curry with tofu and coconut milk. With lots of greens and herbs. | Served with rice |

item.title: 🍽 HUB3 - Lunch Menu
item.description:
🍽 HUB3 - Lunch Menu: | Smagen af det asiatiske gadekøkken | Stegt gris vendt i sticky soja-brun farin-sesam-chilimarinade | Serveret i fløjlsbløde dampede bao boller fyldt med sprød kål, spicy kimchi og goma-dressing | VEGETAR: Stegt tofu vendt i sticky soja-brun farin-sesam-chilimarinade
Week 33 | The taste of Asian street cuisine | Roasted pork in sticky soy-brown sugar-sesame-chili marinade | Served in velvety soft steamed bao buns filled with crispy cabbage, spicy kimchi and goma dressing | VEGETARIAN: Fried tofu in sticky soy-brown sugar-sesame-chili marinade

item.title: 🍽 HUB2 - Lunch Menu
item.description:
🍽 HUB2 - Lunch Menu: | Pulled Pork burger | Langtidsstegt og saftigt svinekød, marineret i røget BBQ-sauce og serveret i en blød briochebolle med cremet coleslaw, sprødsalat og syltede agurker. Hertil BBQ-sauce a part. | VEGETAR: Pulled Jackfruit burger
Mør og krydret ¨pulled¨ Jackfruit, marineret i røget BBQ-sauce og serveret i en blød briochebolle med cremet coleslaw, sprødsalat og syltede agurker. Hertil BBQ-sauce a part. | Slow-roasted and juicy pork, marinated in smoked BBQ sauce and served in a soft brioche bun with creamy coleslaw, crisp lettuce and pickled cucumbers. Served with BBQ sauce a part. | VEGETARIAN: Tender and spicy ¨pulled¨ Jackfruit, marinated in smoked BBQ sauce and served in a soft brioche bun with creamy coleslaw, crispy lettuce and pickled cucumbers. Served with BBQ sauce a part.

item.title: 🍽 HUB1 – Kays - Lunch Menu
item.description: 🍽 HUB1 – Kays - Lunch Menu: | Pasta Bolognese | Som vor ikke-italienske mor lavede den. | Vegetar: Linse bolognese som vor ikke vegetariske, ikke-italienske stedmor lavede den. | As our non-italian mother made it. | Vegetarian: Lentils bolognese as our vegetarian, non-italian stepmother made it. |
